Model

Class Timer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Timer

  • public class Timer
extends java.lang.Object
    En entity for handling timeouts, based on ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor

    • Method Summary

      • setPause

        public void setPause(boolean pause)
        "Stop" the timer. The time period before execution of the Runnable doe snot change unless it is unpaused
        Parameters:
        pause - if true pause otherwise unpause
